innovation_evidence.title: Electric VTOL propulsion with redundant motors
innovation_evidence.summary: Novel vertical takeoff mechanism with 8-motor redundancy for fault tolerance. Addresses single-point-of-failure concerns in eVTOL aircraft.

innovation_evidence.title: Battery Energy Density Requirements for Urban Air Mobility
innovation_evidence.summary: Analysis showing current battery technology insufficient for >50 mile range with economic payload. Projects 2030 as earliest viable timeline.

innovation_evidence.title: Joby Aviation flight controller (archived)
innovation_evidence.summary: Public repository shows no commits in 18 months. Suggests development shifted to proprietary systems or stalled.

adoption_evidence.title: DoD Agility Prime Phase II - Joby Aviation
adoption_evidence.summary: $55M contract for military eVTOL demonstrations. Validates technology for logistics missions.

adoption_evidence.title: FAA Part 135 Air Carrier Certification Progress
adoption_evidence.summary: Joby completed 4 of 5 certification stages. Final stage (type certification) estimated 2025-2026.

adoption_evidence.title: Joby Aviation 10-Q (Q2 2024)
adoption_evidence.summary: $0 revenue reported. $112M cash burn in quarter. Runway extends to Q3 2025 without additional financing.

narrative_evidence.title: Joby Aviation Stock Soars on Dubai Partnership Announcement
narrative_evidence.summary: Stock jumped 34% on news of Dubai skyport network deal. Analyst skepticism over monetization timeline.

narrative_evidence.title: The eVTOL Dream Crashes Into Economic Reality
narrative_evidence.summary: Analysis of sector shows only 2 of 12 startups on track for 2025 commercial operations. Economics remain unproven.

narrative_evidence.title: Archer Aviation Receives $500M Stellantis Investment
narrative_evidence.summary: Major OEM backing signals industry confidence. Stellantis commits to manufacturing partnership for 2026 production.

risk_evidence.title: JoeBen Bevirt (CEO) sold 2.5M shares at $6.80
risk_evidence.summary: CEO sold $17M worth of shares at 18-month high following Dubai announcement. Largest insider sale on record.

risk_evidence.title: Archer CFO Mark Mesler sold 850K shares
risk_evidence.summary: CFO sold 60% of holdings at $4.20/share. Company cited 'personal diversification.'

risk_evidence.title: Joby 10-K Risk Factor: Battery Supply Chain
risk_evidence.summary: Single-source dependency on battery supplier. Alternative suppliers add 18-24 months to timeline if needed.

innovation_evidence.title: Logical qubit error rates below physical threshold
innovation_evidence.summary: Google demonstrates error-corrected qubits with logical error rate 10x lower than physical. Major breakthrough for scalability.

innovation_evidence.title: Topological qubit architecture for fault tolerance
innovation_evidence.summary: IBM patent on topological protection approach. Could enable room-temperature quantum computing if successful.

adoption_evidence.title: Pfizer uses quantum simulation for drug discovery
adoption_evidence.summary: Pilot project simulated protein folding 100x faster than classical. Still experimental, not production.

narrative_evidence.title: Quantum Computing Will Revolutionize AI, Experts Say
narrative_evidence.summary: Breathless coverage of quantum potential. Light on commercial timelines or economic analysis.

narrative_evidence.title: IonQ Stock Soars 200% YTD on AI Hype
narrative_evidence.summary: Retail investor enthusiasm driving valuations. Revenue still <$20M/year vs $2B market cap.

risk_evidence.title: IonQ 10-K: Uncertainty of Commercial Viability
risk_evidence.summary: Company states 'uncertain when or if quantum advantage will be achieved for commercial applications.'
